title: Augusta County: William B. Gallaher to E.C. Gallaher, June 22, 1861
summary: William B. Gallaher describes new additions to the camp, an incident of Federal looting, and the capture of two Federal officers. He also instructs his mother on camp fashions and requests "decent" clothes befitting an officer.
keywords: This letter was transcribed from another transcribed copy. William Gallaher's mother's name was taken from the census.
